title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/unkindly-offenda.html
notes:
HEY MUGU I'M GETTING YOUR PHONE CALLS NOW!
HAHAHAHAHAHAHA
TWELVE SO FAR TODAY
HAHAHAHAHAHAHA
KEEP DEM COMING MUGU
YOU CALL ME AT 234-80-33447751.

messages.subject: PLEASE I NEED YOUR ASSISTANCE.
messages.body:
From Mrs.Pamela E.Savimbi.and Moses Joseph Savimbi.
Tel;234-80-33447751.

ATTENTION SIR.

I am a fifty-year-old woman from the republic of
Angola. I got your details from the (ICQ lnternational
Community)and decided to contact you to see if you
could be of any immense help to me and my entire
family.

My husband Frank Savimbi was the rebel leader in the
country. Just before he was being assassinated, he
gave me us$17million United States dollars] sealed in
a Kist and I departed the country as a refugee to the
republic of Nigeria with my two kids Moses and Joseph
and my immediate younger brother. On arrival to
Nigeria and due to my status, I decided to deposit
this money in a security company for safekeeping as a
family valueables pending when l will see a helper
that will assist me move the huge sum overseas because

>my late husband warned me not to invest the money
in Africa countries.

Right now, I am seeking assistance from you so that I
can transfer the funds from Nigeria to your off shore
account.If this offer meets your approval, you could
reach me on my phone number, or e-mail.

Thanks and All mighty GOD bless you as I await your
urgent reply.

Best Regards,

MRS.Pamela E. Savimbi.

+++
messages.raw:
PAMELA SAVIMBI aka CHIEF FRED

Reply-To: "pampam2003" pampam2003@indiatimes.com
Subject: PLEASE I NEED YOUR ASSISTANCE.
Date: Tue, 27 May 2003 01:21:57 +0530

From Mrs.Pamela E.Savimbi.and Moses Joseph Savimbi.
Tel;234-80-33447751.

ATTENTION SIR.

I am a fifty-year-old woman from the republic of Angola. I got your details from the (ICQ lnternational Community)and decided to contact you to see if you could be of any immense help to me and my entire family.

My husband Frank Savimbi was the rebel leader in the country. Just before he was being assassinated, he gave me us$17million United States dollars] sealed in a Kist and I departed the country as a refugee to the republic of Nigeria with my two kids Moses and Joseph and my immediate younger brother. On arrival to Nigeria and due to my status, I decided to deposit this money in a security company for safekeeping as a family valueables pending when l will see a helper that will assist me move the huge sum overseas because

>my late husband warned me not to invest the money in Africa countries.

Right now, I am seeking assistance from you so that I can transfer the funds from Nigeria to your off shore account.If this offer meets your approval, you could reach me on my phone number, or e-mail.

Thanks and All mighty GOD bless you as I await your urgent reply.

Best Regards,

MRS.Pamela E. Savimbi.

+++

During his flameout as Chief (OF)F.E.NDA, I replied to Pamela from two different accounts
so they could confirm each other's testimony. First, the setup:

messages.body:
This sounds like the opportunity I have been looking
for.  Please tell me how to assist you. 
Blessings
messages.raw:
CALI

This sounds like the opportunity I have been looking for.
Please tell me how to assist you.
Blessings

messages.subject: thanks for your response
messages.body:
DEAR SIR, 
THANK YOU FOR YOUR PROMPT RESPONSE.TO START WITH LET
ME HAVE YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER AND FAX I WILL LIKE TO
SEND YOU SOME OF THE DOCUMENTS ISSUED TO ME WHEN THE
CONSIGNMENT WAS DEPOSITED TO THE SECURITY.AND ALSO
WILL LIKE SPEAK WITH YOU ON THE TELEPHONE.OR YOU CALL
ME IMMEDIATELY YOU RECEIVED THIS MESSAGE IF IAM NOT
ARROUND MY SON WILL ANSWER YOU. 
YOURSFAITHFULLY. 
PAMELA.
messages.raw:
PAMELA SAVIMBI

THANK YOU FOR YOUR PROMPT RESPONSE.TO START WITH LET ME HAVE YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER AND FAX I WILL LIKE TO SEND YOU SOME OF THE DOCUMENTS ISSUED TO ME WHEN THE CONSIGNMENT WAS DEPOSITED TO THE SECURITY.AND ALSO WILL LIKE SPEAK WITH YOU ON THE TELEPHONE.OR YOU CALL ME IMMEDIATELY YOU RECEIVED THIS MESSAGE IF IAM NOT ARROUND MY SON WILL ANSWER YOU.

messages.body:
Mrs Pamela, 
Please send picture of your son first, I would like
see who I am talking to before I give out my personal
number.  A girl can't be too careful I am sure you
understand.  I have re-read your initial letter and I
am very impressed with your business skills, I think
this would be a great investment.  I look forward to
hearing from you and your son.  Is he married?  

Blessings
messages.raw:
CALI

Mrs Pamela,
Please send picture of your son first, I would like see who I am talking to before I give out my personal number. A girl can't be too careful I am sure you understand. I have re-read your initial letter and I am very impressed with your business skills, I think this would be a great investment. I look forward to hearing from you and your son. Is he married?

Blessings

messages.subject: I RECEIVED YOUR MESSAGE.
messages.body:
PAMELA SAVIMBI leaps to the wedding chapel


DEAR GOOD FRIEND 
I DO UNDERSTAND YOUR POINT.DO YOU WANT TO MARRY MY
SON? HE IS NOT YET MARRIED.I WOULD HAVE SEND HIS
PICTURE TODAY BUT THE SERVER IS NOT WORKING NORMALLY I
WILL DO THAT BY TOMORROW BY GOD GRACE. 
PLEASE IT IS VERY IMPORTANT YOU SEND YOUR OWN PICTURE
AS WELL AND YOUR PERSONAL PROFILE AND YOUR HOME OR
COMPANY ADDRESS BECAUSE I AM GOING TO SEND YOU SOME
DOCUMENT AS SOON AS WE START. 
AFTER ALL THIS INFORMATION I WILL NOW GO TO THE
SECURITY COMPANY AND HAVE A MEETING WITH THEM ON HOW
TO RELEASE OUR CONSIGNMENT. 
I AM WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU   
 
PAMELA.
messages.raw:
PAMELA SAVIMBI aka CHIEF FRED

PAMELA SAVIMBI leaps to the wedding chapel From: "pampam2003" pampam2003@indiatimes.com
Subject: I RECEIVED YOUR MESSAGE.
Date: Mon, 09 Jun 2003 17:09:24 +0530

DEAR GOOD FRIEND
I DO UNDERSTAND YOUR POINT.DO YOU WANT TO MARRY MY SON? HE IS NOT YET MARRIED.I WOULD HAVE SEND HIS PICTURE TODAY BUT THE SERVER IS NOT WORKING NORMALLY I WILL DO THAT BY TOMORROW BY GOD GRACE.
PLEASE IT IS VERY IMPORTANT YOU SEND YOUR OWN PICTURE AS WELL AND YOUR PERSONAL PROFILE AND YOUR HOME OR COMPANY ADDRESS BECAUSE I AM GOING TO SEND YOU SOME DOCUMENT AS SOON AS WE START.
AFTER ALL THIS INFORMATION I WILL NOW GO TO THE SECURITY COMPANY AND HAVE A MEETING WITH THEM ON HOW TO RELEASE OUR CONSIGNMENT.
I AM WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU

PAMELA.

messages.body:
Mrs Pamela, 
Marry him?  I do not know, I have never met him!  I do
not lack for suitors.  I was just asking so I could
know more about him. 
I have attached a picture as you requested.  My friend
is on the right, I am on the left.  This was from a
party at a fashion show in New York City. 
Blessings
messages.raw:
CALI

Mrs Pamela,
Marry him? I do not know, I have never met him! I do not lack for suitors. I was just asking so I could know more about him.
I have attached a picture as you requested. My friend is on the right, I am on the left. This was from a party at a fashion show in New York City.
Blessings

Attached picture:
Crown Princess Victoria of Sweden and Princess Martha Louise of Norway

messages.subject: MY GOD MUST BLESS YOU.
messages.body:
DEAR  
THANKS FOR YOUR MESSAGE INCLUDING YOUR PICTURE.WELL
YOU ARE LIKE MY DAUGHTER I LOVE YOU IF GOD SHOULD
TOUCH YOU TO ACCEPT MY SON FOR MARRIAGE I WILL BE VERY
VERY HAPPY. 
PLEASE I WILL LIKE TO KNOW THE KIND OF BUSINESS YOU DO
AND YOUR PHONE NUMBER SOME OF THE DISCUSSION SHOULD
TAKE PLACE ON THE TELEPHONE VERY EASY SO IT IS VERY
IMPORTANT TO HAVE IT.OR YOU CAN CALL HIM ON THIS
TELEPHONE 234-80-33447751. 
AS TOLD YOU BY TOMORROW I WILL BE GOING TO THE
SECURITY COMPANY TO DISCUSS WITH THEM AND KNOW HOW TO
CLAIM THE CONSIGNMENT BUT MAKE SURE THE ACCOUNT WHERE
THE MONEY WILL BE TRANSFERRED WILL BE READY .AFTER THE
MONEY IS TRANSFERRED INTO YOUR ACCOUNT MY SON WILL BE
THEIR FIRST AND YOU WILL ASSIST HIM TO OPEN ANOTHER
ACCOUNT WERE WE WILL DEPOSIT OUR SHARE WHILE YOUR
SHARE CAN BE IN YOUR ACCOUNT IF YOU LIKE. 
I HAVE SOME DOCUMENTS ISSUED TO US WHEN THE
CONSIGNMENT WAS DEPOSITED IN THEIR CUSTODY WHICH I
WILL SEND TO YOU IMMEDIATELY AFTER MY ARRANGEMENT WITH
THEM. 
WELL LET KEEP OUR FINGERS ACROSS AND WAIT TILL
TOMORROW. 
HOW ABOUT YOUR FAMILY? MOTHER AND FATHER BROTHERS AND
SISTER ? PLEASE BRIEF US MORE ABOUT YOUR PROFILES.  
 
I AM WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU.  
 
MRS PAMELA.  

+++

PAMELA SAVIMBI aka CHIEF FRED

I HAVE SOME DOCUMENTS ISSUED TO US WHEN THE CONSIGNMENT WAS DEPOSITED IN THEIR CUSTODY WHICH I WILL SEND TO YOU IMMEDIATELY AFTER MY ARRANGEMENT WITH THEM.

messages.subject: My GOD WILL BLESS YOU.
messages.body:
DEAR BROTHER.
MY GOD WILL BLESS YOU AND YOUR ENTIRE FAMILY TO HAVE
MADE UP YOUR MIND TO ASSIST ME AND MY CHILDREN.
WELL SEND ME YOUR PRIVATE TELEPHONE WHERE WE CAN REACH
YOU EASILY AND FULL INFORMATION ABOUT YOU SO THAT I
WILL HAVE A MEET WITH SECURITY COMPANY AND DISCUSS
WITH THEM ON HOW TO RELEASE THE CONSIGNMENT.
AFTER OUR DISCUSSION I WILL GIVE YOU FULL DETAILS
ABOUT OUR DISCUSSION.
MY REGARDS
 
MRS PAMELA
messages.raw:
PAMELA SAVIMBI to NKOTI

From: "pampam2003" pampam2003@indiatimes.com
Subject: My GOD WILL BLESS YOU.
Date: Mon, 09 Jun 2003 17:00:33 +0530

DEAR BROTHER.
MY GOD WILL BLESS YOU AND YOUR ENTIRE FAMILY TO HAVE MADE UP YOUR MIND TO ASSIST ME AND MY CHILDREN. WELL SEND ME YOUR PRIVATE TELEPHONE WHERE WE CAN REACH YOU EASILY AND FULL INFORMATION ABOUT YOU SO THAT I WILL HAVE A MEET WITH SECURITY COMPANY AND DISCUSS WITH THEM ON HOW TO RELEASE THE CONSIGNMENT. AFTER OUR DISCUSSION I WILL GIVE YOU FULL DETAILS ABOUT OUR DISCUSSION.
MY REGARDS

MRS PAMELA

And then the wheels start coming off Pamela's gravy train - a problem that is testified to by both.
The number is a payphone outside a Hawaii Pizza Hut.

messages.body:
Mrs Pamela,

My phone number is 808-665-9706.  Thank you for
talking to me for so long when I called this morning. 
I think you have all of the bank account information
you need now.  If there is something more you need,
please let me know.

Thank you.
messages.raw:
NKOTI

Mrs Pamela,

My phone number is 808-665-9706. Thank you for talking to me for so long when I called this morning. I think you have all of the bank account information you need now. If there is something more you need, please let me know.

Thank you.

messages.body:
Mrs Savimbi, mother, thank you for talking to me this
morning on the phone.  I did not tell you this on the
phone but I recently lost my mother (my father died
many years ago) and this has been a hard time for me. 
It was so wonderful to hear your voice I feel I am
right there with you.  I will go out now and send the
money as we agreed.  Bless you mother!
messages.raw:
CALI

Mrs Savimbi, mother, thank you for talking to me this morning on the phone. I did not tell you this on the phone but I recently lost my mother (my father died many years ago) and this has been a hard time for me. It was so wonderful to hear your voice I feel I am right there with you. I will go out now and send the money as we agreed. Bless you mother!

messages.body:
Mrs Pamela, I do not understand mother.  We spoke just
this morning and now you say we did not???  I spoke to
you and your son.  He was very charming.  You should
ask him I am sure he will remember.  I sent the money
as we agreed to during our phone call that should make
you happy not upset.  I will call you again later I
need to go now.  Please send your son's picture.
Blessings
messages.raw:
CALI

Mrs Pamela, I do not understand mother. We spoke just this morning and now you say we did not??? I spoke to you and your son. He was very charming. You should ask him I am sure he will remember. I sent the money as we agreed to during our phone call that should make you happy not upset. I will call you again later I need to go now. Please send your son's picture.
Blessings

messages.body:
Mrs Savimbi,

This is most confusing.  I spoke with you this
morning.  I do not understand why you said I am not
dealing with you.  During our call  and I sent my message to your
pampam2003 account by mistake.  Sorry about that.  I
will send future emails to your  email
account.  I have already given you my account
information over the phone.  If something more is
needed please let me know.  I am having my passport
scanned as you requested.

Thank you.
Nkoti
messages.raw:
NKOTI

Mrs Savimbi,

This is most confusing. I spoke with you this morning. I do not understand why you said I am not dealing with you. During our call you said to use your new email account and I sent my message to your pampam2003 account by mistake. Sorry about that. I will send future emails to your xxx@yahoo.com email account. I have already given you my account information over the phone. If something more is needed please let me know. I am having my passport scanned as you requested.

Thank you.
Nkoti

messages.body:
Dear Mrs Savimbi,

I just called the number 234-80-33447751 and talked
with your son.  He confirmed that you received my
passport copy.  Please let me know what else I need to
do.  I will send future emails .  I attach passport in case fax is not good.

Thank you.

+++
messages.raw:
NKOTI

Dear Mrs Savimbi,

I just called the number 234-80-33447751 and talked with your son. He confirmed that you received my passport copy. Please let me know what else I need to do. I will send future emails to your new yahoo account. I attach passport in case fax is not good.

Thank you.

+++

I attached the passport a scammer sent me during a prior exercise. 1 MB TIFF.

Back to the girl:
